refnamediv.refpurpose: 返回对象或类的父类名

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the name of the parent class of the class of which object is an instance or the name.
If the object does not have a parent or the class given does not exist &false; will be returned.
If called without parameter outside object, this function returns &false;.

&reftitle.changelog;
&Version; &Description;
Before 5.1.0
If called without parameter outside object, this function would have returned &null; with a warning.
Since 5.0.0
The object parameter is optional if called from the object's method.
Since 4.0.5
If object is a string, returns the name of the parent class of the class with that name.
